Text:
Any requests?
I'm using a .py script to d/l, rename, and sort the images so it only takes an hour or so to grab a full manga.

Hi, thanks for this share, I have a request to you, can you please upload the manga series called "Manga Bible" It is a five volume manga. I already have the 1st book called "Manga Messiah" but I can't find the other four books, these were the title: Book 2 - Manga Metamorphosis , Book 3 - Manga Mutiny , Book 4 - Manga Melech , Book 5 - Manga Messengers (Addtional Info about this manga --> Written by Hidenori Kumai , Illustrated by Kozumi Shinozawa , Published by Next/ Japan Bible Society, 
English publisher: Tyndale House) I hope you can find the english version, thanks so much,...
Sure, I'll look around and see if I can find a copy of it to upload.

By the way, I've just finished an uploaded of the full manga Monster.

You can find more info about it here:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monster_(manga)

You can find my upload of it here:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8272025

Thanks for seeding!

How about any Gunsmith Cats? Or Bambi and Her Pink Gun?

Thanks for this upload! Great weird story

I've uploaded roughly the first half of Bambi and Her Pink Gun here:

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8277784

I'll try and find the second half later.

Also, I've found the first 5 volumes of Gunsmith Cats online; I'll keep searching for a full version but if I can't find one I'll just upload the partial one.

http://www.pastebay.net/1190991
A list of other Manga I've uploaded.

Thanks!
If you have any requests, I'd be happy to try and get them!
